extendedInfo.description: Connect to the Charlotte Mecklenburg Library from your mobile device. Search our catalog for books, movies, music and more, with easy search features designed for mobile devices. Check your account, place holds or renew items, get library hours and directions, find upcoming events, or contact us. We are here for you!Additional features:* Searching the catalog is easy! Just type in the first few letters of the words in your search. For example, to search for "Mark Twain", just type "ma twa", and results display.*`Download ebooks and eAudiobooks from anywhere, anytime, with OverDrive.* Looking for something specific? Find it in our catalog by scanning the itemâs barcode with your mobile deviceâs camera. * Get live homework help from professional tutors, with Tutor.com.* Connect with us on social networks like Facebook and Twitter.Brought to you by Charlotte Mecklenburg Library | www.cmlibrary.org

reviews.title: Good...
reviews.comment: What do you expect? It\'s pretty good. Easy to use, I like it. I give it 4 stars though because I don\'t like that it\'s confusing when I\'m trying to renew something.
reviews.author: AJ Hendricks

reviews.title: A favorite app
reviews.comment: I love having access to the library catalogs and my account information right at my fingertips. This app is very user-friendly and easy to navigate. I\'d like to see the ability to change status for hold requests in future updates.
reviews.author: Amanda McGuire

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Very convenient and easy to use.
reviews.author: Hamed Tajabadi

reviews.title: Easy to use
reviews.comment: It\'s like going to the library without actually being there.
reviews.author: Peter Niessing

reviews.title: Very convenient!
reviews.comment: Instead of going on the computer to request books and check the status and stuff, i can do it all on my phone :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Won\'t download
reviews.comment: I can\'t get app to download onto my android motorola droid x. No problems on my ipad works well.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very useful!
reviews.comment: I just downloaded the app  and looks fantastic! Thank you!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Thanks
reviews.comment: Great app I  can do everything from my phone cool
reviews.author: Chanel Haggins
